content:
Three units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were able to destroy enemy equipment and personnel at once.

AppropriateThe video was posted on March 20Army.

The battle was attended by fighters of the 60th Mechanized Brigade with the support of the 93rd mechanized brigade and the 52nd battalion of the 63rd mechanized brigade.

Asreported the armyinform, the Defense Forces showed a hunt for enemy equipment.
title: Defense forces stopped the massive assault on the Liman direction
description: The corresponding video was posted on March 20 by a land troops. Fighters participated in the battle ...
author: Army Inform
